questions.quote: H... G... F.  Seat four.  One, two, three... f-- Hello Newman.
It's like when tenant dies in a rent controlled building - you gotta take immediate action.
Hey you know a friend of mine from work said that she saw George at the tennis match on TV yesterday.
Oh, hang onto that thought - I'm rinsing a sweater, I left the water running.  Hey, Jerry, can you get me a towel out of my bedroom closet?
I mean they found a tee and he played golf that day. Nobody walks into a dry cleaner's with a tee. The circumstantial evidence is overwhelming.
25 kids for his birthday party?  Don't put your tongue on the floor! He's putting his tongue on the floor! Here, here, have some more sugar packets.
Oh yeah. These are fantastic, fantastic.  You know, I'd love to get a jump on the next batch, where do you come out?   She's been ignoring this section all night. Quesadilla?
Frolf, frisbee golf Jerry. Golf with a frisbee. This is gonna be my time. Time to taste the fruits and let the juices drip down my chin. I proclaim this: The Summer of George!
. He's good. He's *very* good. He worked on this kid from Guatemala with no nose. Turned him into Ricardo Montalban.
I just wanted to drop off this Chinese balm for your burns. It's supposed to be great stuff. It's all herbal.
